rules.natural: If scientists publish research, then climate change occurs.
Provided that research confirms climate change, climate change follows.
Whenever the agency monitors emissions levels, it is not the case that the agency denies the scientific consensus.
If the law requires emission reductions, then the law mandates compliance deadlines.

rules.prover9_expression: (mandates(law, compliance_deadlines) -> (adopts(agency, cap_and_trade) | (implements(agency, carbon_tax) | (increases(emissions, pollution) -> causes(pollution, health_issues)))))
rules.natural: Whenever the law mandates compliance deadlines, either the agency adopts cap and trade, or the agency implements a carbon tax, or in the event that emissions increase pollution, pollution causes health issues.
If the commission approves policy, then the agency does not delay implementation.
Under the condition that the commission rejects policy, the agency does not delay implementation.
Under the condition that the industry files a lawsuit, the industry does not win the case.
If the judge rules for policy, then the court upholds policy.
Either the judge rules for policy or the judge rules against policy.
Whenever the judge rules against policy, then if the industry files a lawsuit, the industry wins the case.
Either the market creates carbon credits or the market establishes a trading system.
If the market establishes a trading system, then either the agency implements a carbon tax or, in the event that emissions increase pollution, pollution causes health issues.
Whenever the commission regulates the market, then if the market creates carbon credits, the agency adopts cap and trade.
Either the commission regulates the market or the commission supervises trades.
Under the condition that the commission supervises trades, then if the market creates carbon credits, the agency adopts cap and trade.
If pollution causes health issues, then the agency does not support deregulation.
If the legislature passes a bill, then the public does not protest against inaction.
Whenever the legislature amends a bill, the public does not protest against inaction.
If the president signs a law, then the legislature passes a bill.
Under the condition that the president vetoes a bill, the legislature amends a bill.
Either the agency analyzes economic impact or the agency reviews policy effects.
Whenever the agency reviews policy effects, the agency does not deny the scientific consensus.
If the agency reports findings, then the agency does not deny the scientific consensus.
Either the lab tests emissions controls or the lab verifies technology.
Under the condition that the lab verifies technology, the agency does not deny the scientific consensus.
Provided that the agency certifies equipment, the agency approves standards.
If the agency approves standards, then in the event that the lab tests emissions controls, the agency does not deny the scientific consensus.
If the industry lobbies against policy, then the industry does not oppose environmental regulations.
Either the industry lobbies against policy or the industry funds legal challenges.
Whenever the industry funds legal challenges, the industry does not oppose environmental regulations.
Either scientists study climate data or scientists publish research.
Provided that it is not the case that either the commission approves policy or the commission rejects policy, the law does not trigger penalties.
If it is not the case that if emissions increase pollution, then pollution causes health issues, then the agency delays implementation.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the public advocates for regulations, then the agency does not support deregulation, the public protests against inaction.
If it is not the case that either the president signs a law or the president vetoes a bill, then Congress overrides a veto.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(evaluates(committee, analysis) -> (analyzes(agency, economic_impact) -> reports(agency, findings))) -> questions(committee, methodology))
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the committee evaluates analysis, then if the agency analyzes economic impact, the agency reports findings, the committee questions methodology.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(adopts(agency, cap_and_trade) | (implements(agency, carbon_tax) | (increases(emissions, pollution) -> causes(pollution, health_issues)))) -> opposes(industry, environmental_regulations))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the agency adopts cap and trade, or the agency implements a carbon tax, or if emissions increase pollution, then pollution causes health issues, the industry opposes environmental regulations.
If it is not the case that if scientists study climate data, then research confirms climate change, then the agency denies the scientific consensus.
